TopicTitle: Loaded a quicksave - destroyed my career?

Articles.Content: Um So I just loaded a quicksave. I seem to have reverted back in time... a long LONG way back in time on my career mode profile. How do I get my game back?

Ouch. This happens all too often.

If you use Kerbal Alarm Clock, it by default makes backup saves in the course of its operation. If you have made any other backups simply restore from them, but since you're asking here it's a good bet you don't.
